phrase.text: So it is true the Romans are brave. I can order your capture right away...
But you will not do so. You have much to gain from our friendship.
Indeed. As a show of good will I'll share my knowledge of the area.
What would be a good spot for reinforcements to come ashore?
Ah, you already know about the Iberian reinforcements? I shall order my spies to report the Iberians' actions to you directly.
It would be wise to deal with them before they join Syphax.\n\nThere is no time to waste!
